newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Expert Software started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Expert Software started.

text.p: -- UBS Securities Research analyst Michael Wallace said he initiated coverage of Expert Software Inc and Maxis Inc with hold ratings.

-- "(Expert Software) has good brand name recognition and product diversity," Wallace said in a research note. "Expert also has solid marketing and distribution capabilities. More than 70 percent of the company's sales are direct to retailers and much of this goes through non-traditional channels such as supermarkets and bookstores.
"The main drawback is what we see as below-average title quality."

-- He said of Maxis that "The company is is currently struggling due to new product delays and a cyclical product line-up. Maxis is also too dependent on its Slim line, in our opnion, which accounts for about 70 to 75 percent of total revenues.
"Despite these problems with execution, Maxis has good quality products and strong development technology."
-- Expert Software shares were unchanged at 4-7/8 while Maxis was down 1/2 at 15-1/4.
